  4. Watch over 30 minutes of 007 First Light gameplay, launching March 27, 2026  PlayStation.Blog
  5. 007 First Light's opening mission was enough to convince me that I have to play this game, if only for IO's newer, younger Bond  PC Gamer

item.title: Atari Put Out A Super-Tough Metroidvania The Same Day As Silksong And You’ll Never Guess What Happened - Kotaku
item.description:
